title: Best of The Program | Guest: Andrew Torba | 7/14/20
description:
The media is outraged over a photo of Sen. Ted Cruz without a mask on an American Airlines flight. A video resurfaced of actor Nick Cannon spreading anti-Semitic conspiracy theories. We must stand up and protect the nuclear family against those like Black Lives Matter who wish to demolish it. Is it more damaging to keep people at home during the pandemic? Andrew Torba, founder of social media site Gab, joins to discuss how even Visa is banning him and why he believes this is happening.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

We must stand up and protect the nuclear family against those like Black Lives Matter who wish to demolish it. Is it more damaging to keep people at home during the pandemic? Andrew Torba, founder of social media site Gab, joins to discuss how even Visa is banning him and why he believes this is happening.
